messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] busy & contentious list
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 4/12/2003 12:20:43 PM Eastern Daylight Time, ... Busy? It runs hot and cold, but I d suggest that no one mention how slow the list might
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 4/12/2003 12:20:43 PM Eastern Daylight Time,
PHDRWD@... writes:

> Not Theresa, but is the list generally this busy and this contentious?
>

Busy? It runs hot and cold, but I'd suggest that no one mention how "slow"
the list might be one day---that tends to send it into a whirlwind of
activity! In the "be-careful-what-you-ask-for way! <G>

Contentious? Umm...Yes and No. <g> Certain things'll get it going more than
others! Spanking'll draw it out pretty fast! Chores. Christianity---almost
always! <g> Arguing for the sake of arguing---that'll do it!

It's a wonderful place if you want to learn about unschooling and peaceful
parenting---there's no better (the message boards are good too! and has a few
other voices that don't show here!)! Sometimes it's best to just sit back
and read.

Welcome!

~Kelly


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
